comment.author: 34918130@N07
comment._content: Great Photo for Memories.   This brings memories to me.  My Norwegian Father used to throw an old Blanket or an Old Coat over the engine.    TO make sure it would start in the Morning.    His car was old too.   Mange takk for sharing Memories with us.

comment.author: 78944683@N03
comment._content: Wow, is that an early snowplough?
